text: Greg Burns may refer to: * Greg Burns (Australian rules footballer) (born 1958), former Australian rules footballer * Greg Burns (American football) (born 1972), American football coach * Greg Burns (musician), American musician with Red Sparowes * Greg Burns (rugby league) (born 1995), rugby league player * Greg Burns (radio personality), British radio personality, see The Geoff Show ==See also== * Greg Byrnes (born 1987), Australian rugby player
title: Greg Burns
